languages.text: "Сотрудничестве?" {n}Кассия презрительно кривится.{/n} "Вы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}обязали меня служить{/d} на сем корабле под страхом смерти. А теперь избавляетесь, как от наскучившей игрушки?"

traits.locale_text: "Сотрудничестве?" {n}Кассия презрительно кривится.{/n} "Вы обязали меня служить на сем корабле под страхом смерти. А теперь избавляетесь, как от наскучившей игрушки?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}obliged me to serve{/d} on this vessel under pain of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I were an unwanted toy?"
languages.original_text: "Сотрудничестве?" {n}Кассия презрительно кривится.{/n} "Вы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}обязали меня служить{/d} на сем корабле под страхом смерти. А теперь избавляетесь, как от наскучившей игрушки?"

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You obliged me to serve on this vessel under a threat of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I was an unwanted toy?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You obliged me to serve on this vessel under a threat of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I was an unwanted toy?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You obliged me to serve on this vessel under pain of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I were an unwanted toy?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}obliged me to serve{/d} on this vessel under pain of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I were an unwanted toy?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “合作？”{n}卡西娅不屑地皱起了鼻子。{/n}“我当时身处死亡的痛苦之下，被你{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}逼迫着{/d}上了这艘船，为你服务。而现在，你打算把我当成玩腻了的玩具，一甩了之，是吗？”
languages.original_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}obliged me to serve{/d} on this vessel under pain of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I were an unwanted toy?"

traits.locale_text: “合作？”{n}卡西娅不屑地皱起了鼻子。{/n}“我当时身处死亡的痛苦之下，被你逼迫着上了这艘船，为你服务。而现在，你打算把我当成玩腻了的玩具，一甩了之，是吗？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You obliged me to serve on this vessel under pain of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I were an unwanted toy?"

languages.text: «¿Cooperación?». {n}Cassia arruga la nariz con desdén.{/n} «{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}Me obligó a servir{/d} en esta nave bajo pena de muerte. ¿Y ahora me descarta como si fuera un juguete roto?».
languages.original_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}obliged me to serve{/d} on this vessel under pain of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I were an unwanted toy?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cooperación?». {n}Cassia arruga la nariz con desdén.{/n} «Me obligó a servir en esta nave bajo pena de muerte. ¿Y ahora me descarta como si fuera un juguete roto?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「協力？」{n}カシアは軽蔑したように鼻にしわを寄せた。{/n}「あなたは私に、死を覚悟してこの船で働くことを{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}義務づけた{/d}のです。そして今、私を不要なおもちゃのように捨てようとしているのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}obliged me to serve{/d} on this vessel under pain of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I were an unwanted toy?"

traits.locale_text: 「協力？」{n}カシアは軽蔑したように鼻にしわを寄せた。{/n}「あなたは私に、死を覚悟してこの船で働くことを{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}義務づけた{/d}のです。そして今、私を不要なおもちゃのように捨てようとしているのですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Kooperation?" {n}Cassia rümpft angewidert die Nase.{/n} "Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}habt mich unter Androhung der Todesstrafe gezwungen, auf diesem Schiff zu dienen{/d}. Und nun werft Ihr mich weg wie ein nicht mehr benötigtes Spielzeug?"
languages.original_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}obliged me to serve{/d} on this vessel under pain of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I were an unwanted toy?"

traits.locale_text: "Kooperation?" {n}Cassia rümpft angewidert die Nase.{/n} "Ihr habt mich unter Androhung der Todesstrafe gezwungen, auf diesem Schiff zu dienen. Und nun werft Ihr mich weg wie ein nicht mehr benötigtes Spielzeug?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Notre coopération ? {n}rétorque Cassia avec une grimace de dédain.{/n} Vous m'avez menacée de mort si je refusais de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}servir sur ce vaisseau{/d} et maintenant, vous me jetez comme un vulgaire jouet dont vous vous seriez {mf|lassé|lassée} ? »
languages.original_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}obliged me to serve{/d} on this vessel under pain of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I were an unwanted toy?"

traits.locale_text: « Notre coopération ? {n}rétorque Cassia avec une grimace de dédain.{/n} Vous m'avez menacée de mort si je refusais de servir sur ce vaisseau et maintenant, vous me jetez comme un vulgaire jouet dont vous vous seriez {mf|lassé|lassée} ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "İş birliği mi?" {n}Cassia, bu tabiri küçümsercesine burun kıvırıyor.{/n} "Bu gemide {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}hizmet etmezsem{/d} canımı almakla tehdit etmiştin. Şimdi de beni sıkıldığın bir oyuncağın gibi kenara mı atıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Cooperation?" {n}Cassia wrinkles her nose in disdain.{/n} "You {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaTakenByForce}obliged me to serve{/d} on this vessel under pain of death. And now you are throwing me away as if I were an unwanted toy?"

traits.locale_text: "İş birliği mi?" {n}Cassia, hor görürcesine burun kıvırıyor.{/n} "Bu gemide hizmet etmezsem canımı almakla tehdit etmiştin. Şimdi de benden sıkıldığın için beni bir kenara mı atıyorsun?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
